管理
 

Real-Time Statistics

目次

Server Health

Anti-DDoS Blocked IP

Anti-DDoS Blocked IP⇑

説明

A comma-separated list of IP addresses blocked by Anti-DDoS protection, each ending with a semi-colon and reason code indicating why the IP address was blocked.

Potential Reason Codes:

  • A: BOT_UNKNOWN
  • B: BOT_OVER_SOFT
  • C: BOT_OVER_HARD
  • D: BOT_TOO_MANY_BAD_REQ
  • E: BOT_CAPTCHA
  • F: BOT_FLOOD
  • G: BOT_REWRITE_RULE
  • H: BOT_TOO_MANY_BAD_STATUS
  • I: BOT_BRUTE_FORCE


The full list of blocked IPs is also available in the Real-Time Stats report file set in 統計出力ディレクトリ.

構文

<blocked_ip_address>;<reason_code>

例

1.0.100.50;E, 1.0.100.60;D, 1.0.100.70;F
